Text: This is my first torrent, and it's *mostly* legal. Meaning we didn't bother securing the rights for some of the 'borrowed' material.

Addendum: If you're not sure you want to download the whole thing, I suggest tracks 6 (Bela Lugosi's Dead) and 11. (Bugs). Also, track 13 (British Robot) is a fist-in-the-air "Oi" anthem about... C3PO.

Thanks for the interest!
